ayas.text: ṣād ۚ wal qur-āni dhidh dhikr
balil ladhīna kafarū fī `izzatin washiqāq
kam ahlaknā min qablihim min qarnin fanādaw walāta ḥīna manāṣ
wa`ajibū an jā-ahum mundhirun minhum ۖ waqālal-kāfirūna hādhā sāḥirun kadhhāb
aja`alal-ālihata ilāhan wāḥidā ۖ inna hādhā lashay-un `ujāb
wanṭalaqal mala-u minhum anim-shū waṣbirū `alā ālihatikum ۖ inna hādhā lashay-un yurād
mā sami`nā bihādhā fil millatil-ākhirati in hādhā illakh-tilāq
a-unzila `alayhidh dhikru min bayninā ۚ bal hum fī shakkin min dhikrī ۖ bal lammā yadhūqū `adhāb
am `indahum khazā-inu raḥmati rabbikal `azīzil wahhāb
am lahum mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā baynahumā ۖ falyartaqū fil-asbāb
jundun mā hunālika mahzūmun minal-aḥzāb
kadhhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa`ādun wafir`awnu dhul-awtād
wathamūdu waqawmu lūṭin wa-aṣ-ḥābul-aykah ۚ ulā-ikal-aḥzāb
in kullun illā kadhhabar rusula faḥaqqa `iqāb
wa mā yanẓuru hā-ulā-i illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan mā lahā min fawāq
waqālū rabbanā `ajjil lanā qiṭṭanā qabla yawmil ḥisāb
iṣ-bir `alā mā yaqūlūna wadhkur `abdanā dāwūda dhal-ayd ۖ innahu awwāb
innā sakhharnal jibāla ma`ahu yusabbiḥna bil `ashiyyi wal-ishrāq
waṭ ṭayra maḥshūrah ۖ kullul lahu awwāb
washadadnā mulkahu wa-ātaynāhul ḥikmata wafaṣlal-khiṭāb
wahal atāka naba-ul khaṣmi idh tasawwarul miḥrāb
idh dakhalū `alā dāwūda fafazi`a minhum ۖ qālū lā takhaf ۖ khaṣmāni baghā ba`ḍunā `alā ba`ḍin faḥkum baynanā bil ḥaqqi walā tushṭiṭ wāhdinā ilā sawā-iṣ ṣirāṭ
inna hādhā akhī lahu tis`un watis`ūna na`jatan waliya na`jatun wāḥidatun faqāla akfilnīhā wa`azzanī fil khiṭāb

qāla laqad ẓalamaka bisu-āli na`jatika ilā ni`ājih ۖ wa inna kathīran minal khulaṭā-i layabghī ba`ḍuhum `alā ba`ḍin illal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti waqalīlun mā hum ۗ waẓanna dāwūdu annamā fatannāhu fastaghfara rabbahu wakharra rāki`an wa-anāb ۩
faghafarnā lahu dhālik ۖ wa inna lahu `indanā lazulfā waḥusna ma-āb

yādāwūdu innā ja`alnāka khalīfatan fil-arḍi faḥkum baynan nāsi bil ḥaqqi walā tattabi`il hawā fayuḍillaka `an sabīlillāh ۚ innal ladhīna yaḍillūna `an sabīlillāhi lahum `adhābun shadīdun bimā nasū yawmal ḥisāb
wa mā khalaqnas samā-a wal-arḍa wa mā baynahumā bāṭilā ۚ dhālika ẓannul ladhīna kafarū ۚ fawaylul lilladhīna kafarū minan nār
am naj`alul ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti kal mufsidīna fil-arḍi am naj`alul muttaqīna kal fujjār
kitābun anzalnāhu ilayka mubārakul liyaddabbarū āyātihi waliyatadhakkara ulul-albāb
wawahabnā lidāwūda sulaymān ۚ ni`mal `abd ۖ innahu awwāb
idh `uriḍa `alayhi bil `ashiyyiṣ ṣāfinātul jiyād
faqāla innī aḥbabtu ḥubbal khayri `an dhikri rabbī ḥattā tawārat bil ḥijāb
ruddūhā `alayy ۖ faṭafiqa mas-ḥan bis sūqi wal-a`nāq
walaqad fatannā sulaymāna wa-alqaynā `alā kursiyyihi jasadan thumma anāb
qāla rabbigh-fir lī wahab lī mulkal lā yanbaghī li-aḥadin min ba`dī ۖ innaka antal wahhāb
fasakhharnā lahur rīḥa tajrī bi-amrihi rukhā-an ḥaythu aṣāb
wash shayāṭīna kulla bannā-in waghawwāṣ
wa-ākharīna muqarranīna fil-aṣfād
hādhā `aṭā-unā famnun aw amsik bighayri ḥisāb
wa inna lahu `indanā lazulfā waḥusna ma-āb
wadhkur `abdanā ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniyash shayṭānu binuṣbin wa`adhāb
urkuḍ birijlik ۖ hādhā mughtasalun bāridun washarāb
wawahabnā lahu ahlahu wa mithlahum ma`ahum raḥmatan minnā wadhikrā li-ulil-albāb
wakhudh biyadika ḍighthan faḍrib bihi walā taḥnath ۗ innā wajadnāhu ṣābirā ۚ ni`mal `abd ۖ innahu awwāb
wadhkur `ibādanā ibrāhīma wa is-ḥāqa waya`qūba ulil-aydī wal-abṣār
innā akhlaṣnāhum bikhāliṣatin dhikrad dār
wa innahum `indanā laminal muṣṭafaynal-akhyār
wadhkur ismā`īla wal yasa`a wadhal kifl ۖ wakullun minal-akhyār
hādhā dhikr ۚ wa inna lil-muttaqīna laḥusna ma-āb
jannāti `adnin mufattaḥatan lahumul-abwāb
muttaki-īna fīhā yad`ūna fīhā bifākihatin kathīratin washarāb
wa`indahum qāṣirātuṭ ṭarfi atrāb
hādhā mā tū`adūna liyawmil ḥisāb
inna hādhā larizqunā mā lahu min nafād
hādhā ۚ wa inna liṭṭāghīna lasharra ma-āb
jahannama yaṣlawnahā fabi-sal mihād
hādhā falyadhūqūhu ḥamīmun waghassāq
wa-ākharu min shaklihi azwāj
hādhā fawjun muqtaḥimun ma`akum ۖ lā marḥaban bihim ۚ innahum ṣālun nār
qālū bal antum lā marḥaban bikum ۖ antum qaddamtumūhu lanā ۖ fabi-sal qarār
qālū rabbanā man qaddama lanā hādhā fazid-hu `adhāban ḍi`fan fin nār
waqālū mā lanā lā narā rijālan kunnā na`udduhum minal-ashrār
attakhadhnāhum sikhriyyan am zāghat `anhumul-abṣār
inna dhālika laḥaqqun takhāṣumu ahlin nār
qul innamā ana mundhir ۖ wa mā min ilāhin illallāhul wāḥidul qahhār
rabbus samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā baynahumal `azīzul ghaffār
qul huwa naba-un `aẓīm
antum `anhu mu`riḍūn
mā kāna liya min `il-min bil mala-il-a`lā idh yakhtaṣimūn
in yūḥā ilayya illā annamā ana nadhīrun mubīn
idh qāla rabbuka lil-malā-ikati innī khāliqun basharan min ṭīn
fa-idhā sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fīhi min rūḥī faqa`ū lahu sājidīn
fasajadal malā-ikatu kulluhum ajma`ūn
illā iblīsas-takbara wakāna minal kāfirīn
qāla yā-iblīsu mā mana`aka an tasjuda limā khalaqtu biyadayy ۖ astakbarta am kunta minal `ālīn
qāla ana khayrun minh ۖ khalaqtanī min nārin wakhalaqtahu min ṭīn
qāla fakhruj minhā fa-innaka rajīm
wa inna `alayka la`natī ilā yawmid dīn
qāla rabbi fa-anẓirnī ilā yawmi yub`athūn
qāla fa-innaka minal munẓarīn
ilā yawmil waqtil ma`lūm
qāla fabi`izzatika la-ughwiyannahum ajma`īn
illā `ibādaka minhumul mukhlaṣīn
qāla fal ḥaqqu wal ḥaqqa aqūl
la-amla-anna jahannama minka wa mimman tabi`aka minhum ajma`īn
qul mā as-alukum `alayhi min ajrin wa mā ana minal mutakallifīn
in huwa illā dhikrul lil`ālamīn
walata`lamunna naba-ahu ba`da ḥīn
